title: afternoon_temperature_humidity_house_balcony
summary: Afternoon temperature and humidity measurement recorded on house balcony wall at MaMeeFarm.
description: Image documents a digital thermometer-hygrometer mounted on the house balcony wall. The device displays temperature and relative humidity values during the afternoon period.
context_notes: Device mounted on exterior house balcony wall
Used as environmental reference within the farm area
